entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
